name: Pushpay
description: Pushpay Holdings Limited, known as Pushpay, provides a mobile giving and engagement system (including donor tools, finance tools, and a custom app) to the faith sector, nonprofit organizations, and education providers in the US, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand. Pushpay's solutions simplify engagement, payments, and administration, enabling  customers to increase participation in causes they support and build stronger relationships with their communities.

1.4: Seattle, WA, USA and Auckland, New Zealand
1.8: Approximately 350 across the USA and New Zealand
